## Previous Works: DL Models in Breast Imaging

Comparison of CNN, Transformer, hybrid, and GAN models across **segmentation**, **detection**, **classification**, and **multi-task learning (MTL)** capabilities. Based on Wang (2024) and recent literature.

| **Model**                          | **Seg** | **Detect** | **Classify** | **MTL** | **Wang (2024)** |
| ---------------------------------- | ------- | ---------- | ------------ | ------- | --------------- |
| **CNN-based**                      |         |            |              |         |                 |
| U-Net, RU-Net, CRU-Net             | ✓       | ×          | \~¹          | ◇⁵      | ✓ Tbl 3         |
| Attention U-Net                    | ✓+      | ×          | \~¹          | ◇⁵      | ✓ Tbl 3         |
| Mask R-CNN                         | ✓       | ✓          | \~²          | ◇⁶      | ✓ Tbls 3, 4     |
| YOLO / Faster R-CNN / SSD          | ×       | ✓✓         | \~³          | ×       | ✓ Tbl 4         |
| Baseline (VGG / ResNet / DenseNet) | ×⁴      | \~²        | ✓            | ×       | ✓ Tbl 5         |
| Ensembles                          | \~      | \~         | ✓            | ×       | ✓ Tbl 5         |
| Transfer Learning (CNN)            | \~      | \~         | ✓            | ◇⁷      | ✓ Tbl 5         |
| **Transformer-based**              |         |            |              |         |                 |
| Vision Transformer (ViT)           | \~      | \~         | ✓✓           | ◇⁸      | —               |
| Swin Transformer                   | ✓       | ✓          | ✓            | ◇⁹      | —               |
| CTAN (Transformer variant)         | ✓✓      | ✓✓         | ✓✓           | ✓¹⁰     | —               |
| **Hybrid**                         |         |            |              |         |                 |
| TransUNet (ViT + CNN)              | ✓       | ×          | \~¹          | ◇⁸      | —               |
| Swin-Unet                          | ✓+      | ×          | \~³          | ◇⁹      | —               |
| **GAN-based**                      | ✓ (gen) | ×          | \~ (disc)    | ◇       | —               |

**Legend:**
✓ = Native | ✓+ = Enhanced | \~ = Add-ons needed | × = Not supported
◇ = MTL via extensions | ✓✓ = Joint-native MTL

**Footnotes:**
¹ FC layer | ² Region head | ³ MLP head | ⁴ Decoder needed | ⁵ Dual heads
⁶ Mask R-CNN variants | ⁷ Multi-branch fine-tune | ⁸ ViT multi-heads
⁹ Task-specific Swin heads | ¹⁰ CTAN shared attention
